thread.title: Harvey, Mets ready for Game 3; Dodgers' Utley suspended
thread.title_full: Harvey, Mets ready for Game 3; Dodgers' Utley suspended

author: MIKE FITZPATRICK
title: Harvey, Mets ready for Game 3; Dodgers' Utley suspended
text:
Kathy Willens Harvey, Mets ready for Game 3; Dodgers' Utley suspended 
New York Mets Game 3 starter Matt Harvey appears during a National League Division Series baseball workout day, Sunday, Oct. 11, 2015, in preparation for Monday's Game 3 against the Los Angeles Dodgers at CitiField in New York. (AP Photo/Kathy Willens) John McCoy Harvey, Mets ready for Game 3; Dodgers' Utley suspended 
New York Mets shortstop Ruben Tejada falls after a slide by Los Angeles Dodgers' Chase Utley during the seventh inning of an NL Division Series baseball game Saturday, Oct. 10, 2015, in Los Angeles. (John McCoy/Los Angeles Daily News via AP) Kathy Willens Harvey, Mets ready for Game 3; Dodgers' Utley suspended 
Los Angeles Dodgers pitcher Clayton Kershaw catches for fellow pitcher Brett Anderson during a workout Sunday, Oct. 11, 2015, in preparation for Monday's NLDS baseball game against the New York Mets at CitiField in New York. (AP Photo/Kathy Willens) Kathy Willens Harvey, Mets ready for Game 3; Dodgers' Utley suspended 
Los Angeles Dodgers Game 3 starting pitcher Brett Anderson speaks during a press conference on National League Division Series workout day, Sunday, Oct. 11, 2015, in preparation for Monday's Game 3 against the New York Mets, at CitiField in New York. (AP Photo/Kathy Willens) Kathy Willens Harvey, Mets ready for Game 3; Dodgers' Utley suspended 
The National League Division Series logo is painted on the field during a baseball workout Sunday, Oct. 11, 2015, in preparation for Monday's Game 3 between the New York Mets and the Los Angeles Dodgers at CitiField in New York. (AP Photo/Kathy Willens) Posted: Sunday, October 11, 2015 10:05 pm | Updated: 11:02 pm, Sun Oct 11, 2015. 
NEW YORK (AP) — All of a sudden, Matt Harvey's postseason debut contains an extra layer of drama.
